title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: Planning
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning       Administrative History (large pdf)   Business Plan  Fire Management Plan   General Management Plan   Personal Watercraft EA 2012   Personal Watercraft EA 2005  Scope of Collections Statement (pdf)      Â    Planning, Environment and Public Comment (PEPC)  The National Park Service prepares a variety of planning and environmental documents to help guide it in managing park resources. These documents can range from site-specific impact analyses on facility locations to broader park-wide plans for future use and management of a park.  The Planning, Environment and Public Comment website contains all of the currently active plans and environmental documents for the National Park Service.  Direct access to documents concerning Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore is at http://parkplanning.nps.gov/piro
